Label1.text: The template for these dice is from ArnoldSmith86.  The 'classic' dice on the left consist of 9 separate widgets, each of which must be copied into the desired room.  The 'text' and 'image' dice on the right each consist of 15 separate widgets.

Label2.text: To customize the colors of these dice, go to the main widget 'Custom Die.' Change the 'backGroundColor' and 'pipColor' properties. Also, each side of the die needs to have the 'inheritFrom' property link to the main widget. So if you copy this or rename it, you'll have to change the 'inheritFrom' reference on all 6 sides.  To resize the die, simply change the width and height properties in the main widget.

Label3.text:
To customize the text die, go to the widget id of 'd1Side1Cover' Change the css background color to the desired color.  Other css properties impacting the display of the text can also be changed such as font size, alignment, and line height. Also change the text property to whatever is desired.  Then change each of the other side widgets that have an id ending in Cover.

To change the image die, go to the widget id of 'd2Side1Cover' and change the image property to the new image file. Then change each of the other side cover widgets.
